description: Officials say almost 60 people were hurt when a car drove into a crowd, 18 of them children.
title: Volkmarsen attack: Almost 60 hurt after car drives into carnival crowd
title_page: Volkmarsen attack: Almost 60 hurt after car drives into carnival crowd - BBC News
maintext: Maurice P was himself injured and police said they had yet to question him. They raided his home late on Monday and his landlord told local broadcaster Hessenschau that he was a "very calm, totally inconspicuous and always polite person".
